meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels clearly show 02271.3. The red needle on the dial points precisely at the 0.03 mark, or negligibly past it, making 0.03 the most accurate reading with 0.01 resolution. The '0' mark is at 0 degrees (12 o'clock), and each 0.01 increment is 36 degrees clockwise, so 0.03 corresponds to 3 * 36 = 108 degrees.
